column4: I can't figure out how to open a certain postscript file. I tried using open-office, but it doesn't work. I can upload the postscript file, if you want me to.
what is contained in the postscript file
Yeah, but what kind of data is it. Is it a book about your dog? What is it
it was an example for metauml: http://metauml.sourceforge.net/old/faq.html
I followed the compilation step using mpost and it created a file called example.1 but I can't open it.
you should be able to open it with gv/ghostscript.
i googled and it seems like OO is not very good at postscript.
I tried ghostscript, but it gave me an error.
Can you PM me a link to the file?
It won't work, because I'm behind a firewall.
my upload-site doesn't work, but since it is readable as text, I pastebin'd it: http://www.pastebin.org/478700
I think I found a solution for this
I tried install texlive-fonts-recommended, but it told me I already have the latest version.
